item.title: Marbleous Blocks
item.description:
Marbleous Blocks is a point & click, physics based, 3D-puzzle game with a retro vibe. The game was developed in order to drive the development of the Pixleon Engine and learn more about game development, including the release process.
Marbleous Blocks was released on Steam in January 2021. For more information please visit Steam
